definition: to add/to attach/to be close to/to be attached
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: The added value of marriage is also hard to kick.
sentences.chinese: 婚姻的附加值也是不容易踢翻的。

sentences.english: However, you design an extension field into the schema to accommodate additional values.
sentences.chinese: 然而，您要在模式中设计一个扩展字段来容纳附加值。

sentences.english: They can be used to manufacture many products with high added-value.
sentences.chinese: 它们可以用来合成许多高附加值的产品。

sentences.english: Outsource or automate the non-value adding part of HR.
sentences.chinese: 将没什么附加值的HR部分外包或自动化。

sentences.english: Can you quantify the value added?
The seamless pipe is produced as high additional value product.
sentences.chinese: 无缝管担当起开发高技术高附加值产品的重任。

sentences.english: Since the drum gear coupling is heavy and has higher added values, it is necessary to localize the manufacture.
sentences.chinese: 鼓形齿接轴重量大，附加值高，国产化生产十分必要。

sentences.english: Local value-addition, although low, is also bound to show increases in the future.
sentences.chinese: 本地附加值虽然低，但是在未来必将出现增加。

sentences.english: In value-added terms, the real share of exports is even smaller.
sentences.chinese: 从附加值的角度来看，出口所占的真实比重还要更小。

sentences.english: Recommend Ricoh solution and soft wares to global customers, and promote added value service.
sentences.chinese: 和系列软件，力求附加值服务的销售。

sentences.english: At the same time, it was pointed out that high added-value multifunctional finish would be the developing trend in the future.
sentences.chinese: 并指出高附加值的多功能整理是未来的发展方向。

sentences.english: The economic crisis pushed many manufacturers to produce commodities with high added-value.
sentences.chinese: 经济危机促使很多制造商生产出高附加值的商品。

sentences.english: Stand out special characteristic, build new material industrial base with high added value.
sentences.chinese: 突出特色，建设高附加值产业基地。

sentences.english: Coal pyrolysis for valuable chemicals is a new subject for coal utilization.
sentences.chinese: 煤裂解制取高附加值化学品是煤炭利用的一个新课题。

sentences.english: Added value is built into AMIDA's fine products in the form of.
sentences.chinese: 附加值是内置的形式美华达的优良产品。

sentences.english: Second, product structure relative to a single, low value-added products.
sentences.chinese: 二是产品结构相对单一，产品附加值低。

definition: character/intrinsic quality (of a person)/quality (of a product or service, or as in "quality of life", "air quality" etc)
magnitude of value/labor value (in economics, the labor inherent in a commodity)
